loans.name: Agustin

texts.en:
Agustin is been married for over 10 years and he is the owner of the family house.

Agustin sells milk he loves his animals a lot and he also works as a mason. Agustin needs a loan to buy a milking cow.

Agustin and his family live in an adobe house. He hopes you can help him; he would like to have a bigger farm.

loans.use: to buy a milk cow

loans.name: Jimena

texts.en:
Jimena needs a loan to buy construction materials. As you may well know, the construction of a house takes a lot of time and Jimena doesn't have enough money to finish it as quickly as she would like.

Jimena is 25 years old. She has two kids: one is 3 years old and the other is 4 years old. Jimena is married and her husband is a mason. 

Jimena sells potatoes from Tuesday to Sunday. She wakes up very early (at exactly 5:00 a.m.). Jimena has been selling potatoes for one year now.

She wants to build a room at her house. She needs to buy bricks and cement.

loans.use: to buy construction materials

loans.name: Martina

texts.es:
La Sra. Martina es de la ciudad de Santaní, está casada y por medio de su trabajo y el de su esposo lucha por poder salir adelante. Ella es dueña de  una despensa con varios años de funcionamiento, donde tiene ya una clientela formada.
Comenta que su marido es agricultor tiene cultivos diversos y animales vacunos, y de esa manera ambos se ayudan para poder salir adelante. 
Solicita el préstamo para poder comprar productos variados para poder surtir su despensa, como ser verduras, frutas, carne, panificados, enlatados, lácteos y otros, y de esa manera poder seguir con sus ventas y cumpliendo con el pedido de sus clientes. Agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
Mrs. Martina is from the city of Santaní. She's married and through her hard work and that of her husband they fight to get ahead. She's owned a small grocery store for a few years where she already has a stable clientele. Her husband is a farmer who has various crops and cattle which helps them get ahead.
She's requesting the loan to buy various products to stock her store includng vegetables, fruits, meat, baked goods, canned products, dairy poducts, among others which will help her continue with her sales and meet the requests of her clients.
She's grateful for the opportunity given to her to improve her quality of life and that of her loved ones.

loans.use: buy various products to stock her store includng vegetables, fruits, meat, baked goods, canned products, dairy poducts, among others.

loans.name: Edith

texts.es:
La Sra. Edith es de la ciudad de Paraguarí, tiene 24 años, es una conocida costurera de la zona, está en pareja y con él se ayudan para poder salir adelante.
Poco a poco está creciendo en su ramo ya que está adquiriendo cada vez más clientes gracias al excelente trabajo que siempre hace. Pide este nuevo préstamo para poder comprar una nueva máquina de coser, de manera a poder seguir con sus confecciones como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
Mrs. Edith is from the city of Paraguarí, she's 24 years old and a well known seamstress in the area. She has a partner and they help each other to get ahead. She's been growing her business little by little and acquiring new clients thanks to the excelent work she always does.
She's requesting a new loan to buy a new sewing machine so she can continue making her dresses and other works.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine.

loans.name: Nicoderma

texts.en:
Nicoderma is a 54-year-old married woman from San Miguel, Bohol. She has been engaged in a rice-farming business for 33 years now, together with her husband.

Nicoderma is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer and seedlings for the farm. Nicoderma hopes that this loan could help her in expanding her business and making it a success. Her harvest and earnings will pay the school fees of her two children aged nine and twelve.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and seedlings

loans.name: Ponciana

texts.en:
Ponciana invested in rice farming. She grows and sells rice in the community of San Miguel, Bohol. She is a married woman with two dependents aged 11 and 18.

She has been engaged in farming for three decades. She is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer for her farm and pay for her house renovation so her family can have a decent home.

She is hoping that she will have a bountiful harvest that would help improve her earnings and hopes to have a sustainable living in the years to come. Income from her farm will keep her kids in school and will address their foos needs.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and pay for her house renovation

loans.name: Gustavo

texts.en:
Gustavo is a divorced man and the father of 3 sons.

Gustavo needs a loan to restart his electronic sales business: Gustavo sells tv sets, radios, and dvd players and he would like to sell them again. He was working but he got fired. He has a family to feed and he is doing it by himself so he hopes you can help him.

loans.use: to restart his electronic sales business selling tv sets, radios, and dvd players

loans.name: Vivian

texts.en:
Vivian is a strong independent woman. She is 51 years old. She is divorced and she has to take care of her two daughters.

Vivian is selling clothes because she wants to take advantage of the Christmas season. She would like a loan to buy clothes for her business.

Vivian is an artisan but she thinks she will have good income because her daughters will be helping her.

loans.use: to buy clothes for her business

loans.name: Santa Isabel Group

texts.es:
El grupo está en su primer ciclo, es un grupo nuevo que se unió para poder luchar cada una para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos. Están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, donde cada una está esforzándose por mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. 
Mercedes quien se dedica a la venta de comida que ella misma hace y que luego vende y también vende bebidas, ella comenta que por medio de su trabajo lucha para poder ofrecer a sus clientes una calidad de vida digna y sin privaciones.
El préstamo que pide es para poder comprar insumos para poder hacer sus comidas, y también para la compra de bebidas variada para la venta. Agradece por la oportunidad de poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
The group is in its first cycle. It is a new group that formed so they could each fight to improve their living conditions and that of their loved ones. They are in the Poverty Elimination Program, where each member is pushing herself to improve her living conditions.

One of the members is Señora Mercedes who makes a living selling food that she makes herself and later sells. She also sells beverages. She says that through means of her job she fights to be able to offer her customers a decent quality of life without deprivation.

The loan that she requests is to be able to buy ingredients for making her food, and also to buy various beverages to sell. She is grateful for the opportunity to be able to improve her living conditions and that of her loved ones.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make food and to buy various beverages.

loans.name: Koe Rory Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Koe Rory se formó en la ciudad de Caaguazú, es un grupo nuevo, donde todas tienen el sueño de poder mejorar sus vidas a través del comité. Ellas están dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, luchando por mejorar y crecer cada día.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Teodora es una de las que integra este grupo, tiene una despensa bien surtida en la que todos los días trabaja desde muy tempranas horas del días, y es por medio de su trabajo que ayuda a su familia y a sus seres queridos le da lo que necesitan para una vida digna.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para poder seguir con sus ventas, como ser frutas, verduras, panificados, carnes y otros, y de esa manera poder seguir con su trabajo y sus ventas, y brindarle de esa forma una mejora calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
The group called Koe Rory is formed in the city of Caaguazú.  It is a new group where all have the dream to be able to improve their lives through the committee.  They are in the program to eliminate poverty, striving to improve and grow each day.

One of the members is la señora Teodora.  She is one of the ones who started this group.  She has a well stocked grocery store in which she works everyday from very early hours of the morning.  It is through her job that she helps her family; and to her loved ones, she gives them what they need for a dignified life.

She is requesting this loan to be able to invest in buying input to be able to continue with her sales, such as fruits, vegetables, breads, meats, and other things, and in that way be able to continue her work and her sales, and provide her in that way a better quality of life for her family.

loans.use: To buy fruits, vegetables, breads, meats, and other things to be able to stock her grocery store.

loans.name: Lilia

texts.en:
Lilia is a farmer from the town of Trinidad, Bohol. Lilia is a married woman and has been in the farming business for many years now. This is her main livelihood.

Lilia is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer for her farm and food for the family's consumption, like canned goods and seasoning. With these items, she will be able to improve her farm as well as her harvest.

In the future, Lilia hopes to make her business bigger and more productive.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and food for consumption, like canned goods and seasoning

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El grupo lleva por nombre  “KUÑA GUAPA”  está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. A través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y las aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, cada una está luchando para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida.
La Sra. Antonia es la integrante de este grupo, se dedica a la venta de comidas, ella misma se encarga de hacer sus comidas, y luego sale a vender por su barrio. Es una persona muy trabajadora y luchadora que se esfuerza por poder ser alguien en la vida y mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
Antonia pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para poder hacer sus comidas, como ser verduras, condimentos, hortalizas, pollo, jamón, queso y otros, de manera a poder seguir con su emprendimiento y continuar cumpliendo con el pedido de sus clientes.
texts.en:
The name of the group is “KUÑA GUAPA” and this is the first cycle of financing from the program of the women's committee where they all work and help each other to get ahead. Through their effort and continued work as well as their successful woman behavior each of them is fighting to improve their living conditions.
Mrs. Antonia is a member of this group and she sells food. She makes her own food and then sells it in her neighborhood. She's a hard working woman and a fighter who strives to be somebody in life and improve her living conditions and that of her loved ones.
Antonia requests this loan to invest in buying food ingredients to make her meals, like vegetables, condiments, chicken, ham, cheese and others. This will allow her to continue with her business and meet the requests from her clients.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, condiments, chicken, ham, cheese, and others.

loans.name: Hilaria

texts.en:
Hilaria is an active member of CEVI, an MFI in Bohol, Philippines. She trusted the institution for her financial needs. 

She manages a Sari-sari store business in the community of Trinidad, Bohol. Recently, she asked for a loan to buy tooth paste, shampoo, insect repellent, canned sardines, seasoning, detergent powder, soy sauce, vinegar, bath soap and feed.

She will use her profits for the school fees of her youngest child who is 22 years old.

loans.use: to buy tooth paste, shampoo, insect repellent, canned sardines, seasoning, detergent powder, soy sauce, vinegar,  bath soap and feed

loans.name: Dok's Group

texts.en:
A 41-year-old married woman, Dok resides in Tbaung Khmum province and has two dependent children, one of whom is under school age. The family’s income is from growing wet season rice and raising ducks and chickens. A challenge in the rice farming business is gaining low outputs from crops suffering from drought.

Dok formed a group of two members to apply for a loan from VisionFund, which will be a first cycle loan for her. As the group leader, she will use her loan to buy organic fertilizer and fuel for the pumping machine. She hopes that this loan will enable her to improve crop productivity so she can make a better living.

loans.use: to buy organic fertilizer to put on her farmland in order to grow her crops.

location.town: Tbaung Khmum province, Ou Reang Ov district

loans.name: Entre Las Flores Group

texts.es:
El grupo se llama Entre las Flores está en su ciclo número 1 del programa de comité de mujeres, es de la ciudad de Concepción, está ubicada en una zona alejada de la zona céntrica, aun en crecimiento, y con poco acceso a ciertos medios.
La Sra. Dora es una de las integrantes, se dedica a los trabajos de ao poi, es una mujer muy buena en lo que hace, y es por ello que le va muy bien, es una buena tejedora, conocida, y gracias a su trabajo ayuda a su familia y a sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar hilos, bastidores, y otros, y de esa manera poder seguir con sus bordados de ao poi, ella agradece por la oportunidad que reciben de poder ayudar a sus seres queridos por medio de su trabajo.
texts.en:
The group named "Entre las Flores" ["Between the Flowers"] is in cycle number one in the women's committee program. It is from the city of Concepción, located in a zone cut off from the central zone though still growing. It has little access to certain means.

Ms. Dora is one of the members. She earns a living through works of ao po'i embroidery. She is a woman who is very good at what she does, and it is because of this that things are going very well. She is a good, well-known weaver, and thanks to her work, she helps her family and her loved ones.

She requests this loan in order to be able to buy thread, frames, and other things, and in this way to be able to continue with her ao po'i embroideries. She is thankful for the opportunity that they receive to be able to help their loved ones through their work.

loans.use: to buy thread, frames, and other things in order to make ao po'i embroidery.

loans.name: Sagrada Familia Group

texts.es:
El comité Sagrada Familia  se encuentran en su ciclo número 2, está conformado por 15  mujeres trabajadoras,  cada una buscan el bienestar de su familia, por lo tanto decidieron unirse en este comité.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Nelida, ella trabaja lavando ropas  y ahora gracias al programa de microfranquicias que ofrece la fundación paraguaya, desea implementar en la venta de productos de limpieza que ella misma hará.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de microfranquicias de producto de limpieza, y de esa manera elaborar todo tipo de productos para la venta, y tener un medio más de ingresos para ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
The committee Sagrada Familia is in their second cycle. It's made up of 15 hard working women, each of them looking out for the well being of their families which is why they decided to get together and form a committee.
One of the members is Mrs. Nelida who works washing clothes and now, thanks to the small business program from Fundacion Paraguaya, she wishes to start selling cleaning products that she will make. She's requesting the loan to buy the micro franchise of cleaning products so she can make different products for sale and have an additional income to help her family.

loans.use: buy the micro franchise of cleaning products to sell different products.

loans.name: Bopha

texts.en:
Bopha, a married woman, is 35 years-old. She is blessed with three children, two of whom are dependent on her and still in school. 

She lives in Siem Reap province, where her rice growing business has been running as the main source of income for 17 years. She is also working as a tailor to earn additional income. Both businesses earn her about $11 USD per day, and she can manage to save only about $4 USD per day. 

This is the first cycle loan for her with VisionFund. Bopha is going to use her loan to buy cloth and some tailoring materials to support her business. She hopes that this loan will enable her to have enough material to perform her business, so that she can earn more income to upgrade her standard of living and keep her children in school.

loans.use: to buy cloth and some tailoring materials so as to have enough material to perform her business well.

location.town: Siem Reap Province, Srey Snom district

loans.name: Salvacion

texts.en:
Salvacion has been engaged in a sewing business for 33 years. She is married with two grown children. Her youngest is eighteen. Her husband is a farmer and a painter. 

Salvacion makes beautiful curtains for her customers and repairs dresses. She is requesting a loan from CEVI to buy more cloth to make into finished products, like curtains and dresses. 

She will be happy to help her husband in earning income for their household, to help buy food and pay for electricity and water.

loans.use: to buy more cloth for her sewing business.

loans.name: San Antonio De Padua Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado San Antonio de Padua  está en su   ciclo 21 del programa de Comité de Mujeres, donde todas trabajan para salir adelante. Están además dentro del programa de eliminación de la pobreza, cada una poniendo su mayor esfuerzo para poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y la de sus seres queridos.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Evelin, quien vende prendas de todo tipo, comenta que a través de su humilde trabajo tiene los medios necesarios para poder ayudar a su familia para que tengan una vida digna y sin privaciones. Evelin lucha para poder crecer y capacitarse en el humilde emprendimiento que tiene.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de jeans, camisas, pantalones, camisas, remeras y otras prendas y de esa manera tener una buena variedad que poder ofrecer a sus clientes. Ella al igual que las demás integrantes de están agradecidas por la oportunidad que están recibiendo de poder crecer y salir adelante.
texts.en:
The group named San Antonio de Padua is in it's 21st cycle of the program of the women committe where everyone works to get ahead. They are also part of the program for the elimination of poverty, each of them making their biggest effort to improve their living conditions and that of their loved ones.
One of the members is Mrs. Evelin who sells all types of clothing items. She mentions that through her humble work she has the necessary means to help her family live a dignified life without suffering from any needs. Evelin fights to grow and train in her field.
She requests this loan to invest in buying jeans, shirts, pants, t-shirts and other items, in this way offering a good variety of clothes to offer her clients.
All the members are grateful for the opportunity to grow and get ahead.

loans.use: buy jeans, shirts, pants, t-shirts and other items.

loans.name: Bhagabati's Group

texts.en:
Bhagabati's life story is one of those inspiring tales which motivates you to move ahead in life, no matter what. She is a mother of two children, a son and a daughter, and wife of a daily wage labourer. They live in Jeypore town of Odisha, India. Both of her children are enrolled in school. She wants to ensure higher education for both of them.

Hence she has decided to open her own vegetable shop, so she can save and put aside money for her children's future. She observes that her native city is expanding and with that growth come opportunities for more retail businesses. Vegetables, being a good of daily consumption, have a good market.

To start off with her idea, she needs to make a capital investment and so she and her group member have approached Kiva's partner People's Forum for a loan of 30,000 INR. She will use her portion of the loan to purchase vegetables in bulk in order to resell.

Bhagabati is standing to the righthand side in the photograph in a yellow saree.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables in bulk in order to resell

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is into raising hogs to support her family. She is also selling prepaid top-up in her neighborhood for additional income.

Delia is happy that even if her children are grown, she can help her husband when it comes to the daily expenses of their household.

She is requesting a loan to buy sacks of feed and more prepaid top-up for her customers. Delia aims at a sustainable business for her to live a prosperous life with her husband.

loans.use: to buy sacks of feed and more prepaid top-up (phone time).

loans.name: Sharon

texts.en:
Sharon is a single woman who lives in Tubigon, Bohol with her family. She is 33 years old and engaged in various businesses to earn a living. She drives a tricycle (a motorcycle with a covered sidecar that seats anywhere from one passenger to as many as the driver will allow), buys and sells coconut shells and sells barbecue to the community in the evening.

Sharon has applied for a 10,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner CEVI to pay for her tricycle registration. Driving her tricycle is her main source of income, so it is important for her to be registered for her safety. Sharon’s main goal in life is to achieve and sustain a good standard of living through her work.

loans.use: to pay for her tricycle registration.

loans.name: Sokhom's Group

texts.en:
Sokhom, 52, lives with family members in a rural area at Cheung Prey district of Kampong Cham province. She is a mother of five dependent children.

To support her family, she can earn income via rice cropping and duck-raising. Her rice did not grow well and her ducks also got ill. These are her main challenge. Sokhom has been with her business for 20 years and she can save from her income about 10 USD per day.

She leads a group of three members to apply for a new loan and this is her first time with VisionFund. She will spend her loan portion to expand her farmland to support her farming business and to buy more duck feed to support her raising business.

She hopes that she can earn more income to improve her condition better than last year.

loans.use: to have more plots of farmland to expand her farming area as well as increase her income.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Chanthorn's Group

texts.en:
A local farmer living in Cheung Prey district of Kampong Cham province, Chanthorn is 44 years old. She is a mother of four children, two of whom are in school while the other two are in university.

She can earn income to support on her living condition via rice growing and climbing on palm trees to get palm juice to sell. She has been involved in her business for 20 years and it lets her save from her daily income about 9 USD per day.

This is first time for Chanthorn with VisionFund and she leads a group of three to apply for this loan. As the group leader, she will manage her loan portion to buy fertilizer and purchase more organic pesticide to improve her rice farm to get a higher yield.

She hopes that her farming can produce a better yield than last year, so she can earn more income to upgrade her lifestyle and support on her children’s education as well.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and purchase more organic pesticide to increase productivity of her crop yields.

location.town: Kampong Cham province, Cheung Prey district

loans.name: Fathullo

texts.ru: Фатхулло добродушный и жизнерадостный мужчина в возрасте 31 лет. Он женат, но к сожалению пока не имеет детей. Поэтому всю свою душу он вкладывает в свою работу. Фатхулло живёт со своей женой в небольшом доме в сельском посёлке. Чтобы прокормить свою семью он занимается своим бизнесом. Фатхулло занимается деканством и животноводством. У него имеется земельная площадь. Из общей площади земли, некоторая часть земли составляет богарные земли, а остальная площадь это поливные земли. На этой земле Фатхулло занимается выращиванием моркови, картошки и зерновых культур. А его жена помогает ему ухаживать и растить скот. Так как земельная площадь у них большая, они также пасут на ней своих скот. Бизнес животноводства приносит хороший доход, поэтому Фатхулло хочет расширить этот бизнес, увеличив поголовье своего скота. Для этого он обратился в Арванд, чтобы получить кредит на покупку скота. Фатхулло заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Fathullo is a kind-hearted and cheerful man of 31 years old. He is married, but without kids yet unfortunately, which is why he puts all his mind and soul into his work. Fathullo and his wife live in a small house in the countryside. To provide for his family, Fathullo is running his own business. He is a dekhan farmer breeding livestock. He owns a land lot which is partially dry land, partially irrigated land. On this land Fathullo cultivates carrots, potatoes, and crops. His wife helps him look after livestock. As their land lot is big enough, they also graze their livestock on it. This business generates a decent income, hence, Fathullo wants to expand it by increasing the livestock headcount. This is the reason he turned to Arvand for a loan to buy cattle. Fathullo is grateful in advance for Arvand's support.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Sobiramo

texts.ru: Собирамо женщина с большим жизненным опытом за спиной. Ей 57 лет. Она живет в городке Куляб. Народ Куляба славится своим не сравнительным стилем гостеприимства и чувством юмора. Собирамо потеряла своего мужи и много переживала, но благодаря своему 4 летнему внуку она смогла выйти из стресса. Собирамо начала снова занимается шитьем. Она уверена, что шить это ее призвание. Собирамо решила купить швейную машинку и принимать заказы на шитье и помочь дочке обеспечить семью. Ее дочь одна кормит свою маму и ребенка. Она работает учительницей с средней школе. Зарплата учителя очень маленькая, и Собирамо понимая, как тяжело дочке хочет ей помочь. Она просит кредит для приобретения новой швейной машинки. И верит, что ее просьба не останется незамеченной.
texts.en: Sobiramo is a woman with a rich life experience behind her. She is 57 years old. She lives in the town of Kulob, the people of which are famous for their hospitality and sense of humor. Sobiramo's husband passed away and she was grieving for a long time, but her four-year-old grandson helped her cope with stress. She took up sewing again. She is confident that sewing is her vocation. Sobiramo decided to buy a sewing machine to take orders and hel her daughter provide for the family. Her daughter is a single mom providing for her mother and her son, working as a secondary school teacher. The teacher's salary is relatively low, and knowing this and how hard it is for her daughter to provide for her family, Sobiramo wants to help out. She is requesting a loan to buy a new sewing machine. She believes that her request won't be left unnoticed.

loans.use: to buy a new modern sewing machine

loans.name: Halida

texts.ru: Халида, 35 лет, замужем, есть 3 детей. У Халиды высшее образование, уже много лет она работает преподавателем в школе. Ежемесячная заработная плата - 10,000 сом (KGS). Она очень трудолюбива и ответственна. Обратилась в Банк "Бай-Тушум" за кредитом в сумме 25,000 сом (KGS), который она направит на покупку обоев, кафеля, краски и прочих материалов для проведения ремонта в квартире. Доходы Халида будет направлять на дальнейшее улучшение жилищных условий.
texts.en: Halida is 35, married, and the mother of three children.  She has a college education and she's been working as a school teacher for many years.  Her monthly salary comes up to 10,000 som (KGS).  Halida is very hardworking and responsible.  She has turned to Bai Tushum and requested a loan of 25,000 som (KGS).  She will use this loan to buy wallpapers, tiles, paints, and other supplies to perform some renovations in her apartment.  She will use her earnings to further improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to buy wallpapers, paints, tiles etc. for home improvement.

loans.name: Nurzaada

texts.ru: Нурзаада, 35 лет, замужем, мать 3 детей. Образование-среднее, много лет она занимается животноводством, в хозяйстве есть 6 коров, 6 телят, 30 овец и 4 лошади. В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Нурзаада обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 70,000 сом (KGS) на покупку телят для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита Нурзаада планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса и улучшение благосостояния семьи.
texts.en: Nurzaada is 35 years old, married, with three kids. She has completed secondary education, and has been breeding livestock for many years. She owns 6 cows, 6 calves, 30 sheep and 4 horses. To further develop her business, Nurzaada turned to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 70,000 som (KGS) to buy calves for fattening and resale. Nurzaada will invest the borrowed money to further expand her business and improve the family's wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy some calves for fattening and resale

loans.name: Sarabyubyu

texts.ru: Сарабюбю, 54 года, вдова, 2 детей. Она ответственная, трудолюбивая, пунктуальная и настойчивая. Образование у нее среднее, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 36 лет назад с 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Сарабюбю, на данный момент в ее хозяйстве имеется 5 коров, 2 овцы. На участке мерою 0,74 ГА она выращивает ячмень. Ежемесячный доход составляет примерно 8,000 сом (KGS), этих средств не хватает на достойную жизнь, поэтому чтобы получить возможность развить ее дело и увеличит доходы, Сарабюбю обратилась в Банк «Бай–Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 60,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 3 бычков для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита она планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса и обучение сына.
texts.en:
Sarabyubyu is 54 years old, widowed, and has two children. She is responsible, hardworking, punctual, and persevering. She has secondary education, and she breeds livestock and cultivates crops as the main source of income for her family, having started 36 years ago with 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Sarabyubyu's persistent hard work, currently her farm has five cows and two sheep. On a land plot of 0.74 hectares, she cultivates barley. Her monthly income is about 8,000 som (KGS), and these funds are not sufficient for an adequate life. 

Thus, in order to make it possible to develop her business and increase her income, Sarabyubyu has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 60,000 som (KGS) in order to buy three calves for fattening and resale. She plans to invest the funds from the loan in the further expansion of her business, and in paying for her son's education.

loans.use: to buy three calves for fattening and resale to help bolster her income.

loans.name: Kamila

texts.ru: Камила, 29 лет, не замужем, 2 детей. Камила на протяжении 4 лет занимается торговлей продуктами питания, посудой. В обороте есть товар на сумму 50,000 сом (KGS). Ежемесячный доход составляет 6,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Камила обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку продуктов питания для увеличения средств в обороте. Она является участником группы "Бекзод", всего в группе состоит 3 человека. Доходы от кредита Камила планирует вложить в дальнейшее расширение бизнеса и планирует накопить средства на покупку земельного участка для постройки дома.
texts.en:
Kamila is 29 years old, unmarried, and has two children. Kamila has been selling food products and crockery for the last four years. She has goods in stock worth 50,000 som (KGS). Her monthly income is 6,000 som (KGS). In order to develop her business further, Kamila has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) to buy food products to increase her stock.

She is a member of the "Bekzod" group which comprises three people in total. Kamila plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in the further expansion of the business and plans to save up to buy a plot of land to build a house.

loans.use: to buy food products for retail sale in her shop.

loans.name: Hoshimjon

texts.ru: Хошимчон трудолюбивый мужчина. Ему 41 лет. У него среднее  образование. Он женат  и у него двое детей. Он сотрудничает с МДО Арванд с 2013 года. Хошимчон заботливый муж и отец. Он старается ради благополучия своих детей и хочет чтобы его дети получили высшее образование. Сейчас он хочет купить ноутбук для своих детей, но у него не хватает собственных средств. Он обратился в Арванд за кредитом. Заранее благодарит за поддержку и понимание.
texts.en:
Hoshimjon is a hardworking man. He is 41 years old. He has secondary education. He is married and has two children. He has been cooperating with MDO Arvand since 2013. Hoshimjon is a caring husband and father. He tries for the sake of his children's well-being, and wants his children to receive higher education. 

Now he wants to buy a laptop for his children, but he does not have enough funds. He has applied to Arvand for a loan. In advance, he offers his thanks for the support and attention.

loans.use: to buy a laptop

loans.name: Gulbi

texts.ru: Гулби трудолюбивая и жизнерадостная женщина. Ей 40 лет. Она замужем и имеет пятеро детей. У неё среднее образование. Она работает уборщицей  школе. Для того, чтобы иметь постоянный доход на пропитание Гулби вместе со своим мужем начали свой бизнес. Они занимаются животноводством. Гулби выращивает скот, затем продаёт полученное от скота мясо и молоко. От этого бизнеса Гулби получает хороший доход. Муж Гулби также работает в местной мастерской и  его работа приносит дополнительный доход в семью. Их совместного дохода хватает на проживание среднего уровня. И пока у них недостаточно средств, чтобы покрывать все имеющиеся нужды. В данный момент Гулби с мужем хотят купить ещё несколько голов скота для откармливания. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд и хочет взять кредит на покупку скота. Гулби заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку, вследствие которой  улучшится качество жизни её семьи.
texts.en:
Gulbi is a hardworking and cheerful woman. She is 40 years old. She is married and has five children. She has secondary education. She works as a cleaner in a school. 

In order to have a regular income to get by, Gulbi and her husband started their own business. They work in animal husbandry. Gulbi rears livestock, and sells their meat and milk. Gulbi receives a good income from this business. Gulbi's husband also works in a local workshop, and his job brings extra income for the family. Their combined income is enough to live averagely. They do not have enough funds to cover all their necessary expenses. 

Currently, Gulbi and her husband want to buy a few more heads of livestock for fattening up. Thus, she has turned to Arvand and wants to take a loan to buy livestock. Gulbi thanks Arvand in advance for the support, which will improve her family's quality of life.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Odiljon

texts.ru: 28 летний Одилджон прекрасный предприниматель  и знаток своего дела. Он уроженец города Истаравшан. Он женат и имеет  двух детей.  Более 5 лет он занимается разведением и продажей крупно и мелкорогатого скота. Но перед наступлением холодов Одилджон хочет закупить еще животных и комбикорм, а также отремонтировать загон для скота. Но для этого ему не хватает денежных средств, и он обратился к Вам за помощью с верой на положительный ответ.
texts.en:
Odiljon is 28 years old, an excellent businessman, and knows his work very well. He is a native of Istaravshan city. He is married and has two children. He has been involved in the breeding and selling of large and small cattle for more than five years. 

Before the onset of cold weather, Olidjon wants to buy more cattle and mixed fodder, and also to renovate the cattle enclosure. However, he does not have enough funds for this, and he is appealing to you for help, with faith in a favourable response.

loans.use: to buy cattle and mixed fodder, and to renovate the cattle enclosure.

loans.name: Salima

texts.ru: Салима успешно погасила предыдущий кредит. Она рада на Вашу поддержку. Ее старший сын женился. Он сейчас уехал с отцом загранице. Салима кроме животноводческой деятельности занимается растениеводством. Она на все успевает. Ухаживает скота и работает на земле. У нее имеется большой земельный участок. Салима готовиться к новому посеву урожай. Сейчас она готовить землю. Ей в работе помогает ее невестка. Салима хочет отработать землю минеральными удобрениями, чтобы получить качественный урожай. Она просит кредит для купли минеральных удобрений и семян урожай. Салима надеется на Вас.
texts.en: Salima successfully repaid her previous loan. She was glad of your support. Her eldest son has married. Now he has gone abroad with his father. In addition to rearing animals, Salima grows crops. She manages to do everything. She looks after the livestock and works on the land. She has a large plot of land. Salima is getting ready to sew a new crop. Now she is preparing the soil. Her daughter-in-law helps her with her work. Salima wants to treat the soil with mineral fertilizer in order to get a good harvest. She is asking for a loan to buy the mineral fertilizer and seeds. Salima hopes in you.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer and seeds.

loans.name: Bаy

texts.ru: Бай из района Бохтар. Ему 55 лет. Он семейный мужчина. У Бай 4 сыновья. Один из них студент, учиться в университете. Двое находится на заработках в Российской Федерации. А младший сын помогает отцу  в работе. Его жена домохозяйка, она занимается животноводством. Бай не одинокий отец, у него четыре прекрасные сыновья. Бай верит своим сыновьям и доверяет им, потому что они честные, ответственные и заботливые парни. Бай на районе занимается земледелием. У него имеется земельный участок, для выращивания растения. Бай в этом году посадил капусту. У него хорошо получилось. Он собирает богатый  урожай. Бай сейчас готовиться к новому посеву урожай. После сбора капусты он решил посадить картофель и морковь. У Бай есть маленькая проблема, нехватка денежных средств. По этой причине Бай обратился за кредитом. За счет кредита он купить минеральные удобрение и семена картофель и морковь.
texts.en:
Bai is from the Bohtar region. He is 55 and a family man, with four sons. One of them is a university student, two are working in Russia and the youngest helps his father with his work. His wife is a homemaker who works in animal husbandry. Bai is not a lonely father - he has four wonderful sons. He believes in his sons and trusts them, because they are honest, responsible and caring men. 

Bai works in agriculture. He has a piece of land where he grows crops. This year he planted cabbage, a decision that worked out well as he has had a rich harvest. He is now preparing to plant his land again and, after harvesting the cabbage, he has decided to plant potatoes and carrots. He has a small problem, though, which is a lack of money. For this reason he is requesting a loan to buy mineral fertilizer, seed potatoes and carrot seeds.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer, seed potatoes and carrot seeds

loans.name: Zohran

texts.en:
Zohran comes from to Lahore. She has two children. Her elder son has a small fruit and vegetable shop in the nearby market. A wide variety of fruits and vegetables come into the market with each changing season from different region of Pakistan. Every region has a speciality in terms of fruits and vegetables. These are brought into the local mandis or Market from where different wholesellers and retailers buy at reasonable rates for reselling.

Her son purchases them from these markets. He is still learning the tricks of the trade and is young and hardworking. He sells fresh items and has been able to grab a good customer base. His mother is happy to see her son's shop flourish. Her son wants to buy vegetables at his store as he runs short of it due to increasing demand. Since he lacks funding, Zohran has requested for a loan from BRAC Pakistan to help her son buy vegetables.

loans.use: to help her son buy more vegetables for his store. .

loans.name: Natividad

texts.en:
Natividad is 60 years old, married with five children.

Natividad works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15000 loan through NWTF to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

Natividad has borrowed and paid 4 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 10 years and also earns an income from vegetables vending and selling dry goods.

Natividad aspires to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy more groceries to sell in her general store.

loans.name: Evangeline

texts.en: Evangeline is a 48-year-old woman who lived in Baybay, Leyte and is engaged in direct selling business. She sells cosmetics, fragrances, apparels and other beauty products while her husband works hard as a carpenter. They raised their two children through this business with the help of the loans that they have. Currently, Evangeline is asking for a loan to operate her business continuously. From this loan she will purchase the products mention earlier. In the future, Evangeline dreams to be successful in her chosen field of business.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics, fragrances, apparels and other beauty products

loans.name: Artur

texts.en:
Artur has been involved in music orchestration works since 2005. With 10 years of experience, he has been doing music videos, commercials, broadcasts music orchestration works.
Artur lives with his wife and their two school aged children in Yerevan town. This loan is very important for him to purchase synthesizer needed for making music orchestration works and providing income for his family. 
He hopes for lenders' support as the new musical instrument will give him opportunity to take on more orders and will enlarge his income.

loans.use: to pay for a synthesizer needed for making music orchestration works and providing income for his family.

loans.name: Trabajadoras Group

texts.es:
El grupo llamado Trabajadoras está en su ciclo número 2° del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, donde las 17 mujeres ponen lo mejor de sí para poder crecer y salir adelante.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Ydalina, quien se dedica a vender comidas de todo tipo, comenta que es muy buena con lo que prepara y es por eso que tiene muchos clientes. Todos los días empieza su trabajo desde muy temprano, que es cuando hace ella misma sus comidas, y luego sale a vender por su barrio.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en la compra de insumos para poder hacer sus comidas, como ser condimentos, carne, pollo, hortalizas, panificados y otros, Ydalina al igual que sus compañeras está contenta por la oportunidad que todas reciben.
texts.en:
The group called Trabajadoras is in its second cycle of the Committee for Women program where everyone works and helps each other to get ahead. They are doing the Elimination of Poverty survey where the 17 women do their best in order to be able to grow and get ahead.

One of the members is Ydalina who works selling all types of food. She says that what she prepares is very good and this is why she has many customers. She begins her work very early every day when she begins making her meals and later she leaves to sell in her neighborhood.

She is asking for this loan in order to invest it in the purchase of supplies in order to make her meals, such as condiments, meat, chicken, vegetables, bakery products, and more. Ydalina and her colleagues are happy for the opportunity they receive.

loans.use: to buy supplies to make meals, such as: condiments, meat, chicken, vegetables, bakery products, and more.

loans.name: Basilicio

texts.es:
El Sr. Basilicio se dedica a la venta de carbón hace varios años, tiene una clientela formada y segura que siempre compra de él su producto. También tiene como segunda actividad a la compra y venta de animales, es una persona muy trabajadora, que en compañía de su esposa e hijos se ayudan para poder tener una mejor calidad de vida.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar carbón en cantidad, de manera a poder seguir con sus ventas y cumpliendo con los pedidos de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Basilicio has worked selling coal for many years. He has a shaped and steady clientele who always buy their product from him. He also buys and sells animals as a second job. He is a very hard-working person who, accompanied by his wife and children, helps to be able to have a better quality of life.

He is asking for this loan to be able to buy quantities of coal, in order to keep going with his sales and fulfill his customer's orders.

loans.use: to buy quantities of coal to sell.

loans.name: Basilia

texts.es:
La Sra. Basilia es separada, se dedica a la venta de productos Avon (cosméticos por catálogo), realiza  la comercialización casa por casa hace más de 10 años, además de ello también tiene una casa que alquila, lo cual le genera un ingreso extra. Comenta que se encarga de atenderle a su madre  que ya es de edad muy avanzada  que  ya está en  silla de ruedas. 
Es una persona muy responsable y trabajadora. Menciona que su mayor deseo es seguir ayudando a su madre para  una  mejor vida.  
Solicita el crédito para compra de materiales de construcción para mejorar la vivienda que alquila, de manera a poder seguir ofreciendo un buen lugar a sus inquilinos.
texts.en: Basilia is divorced and works selling Avon products (cosmetics through a catalog). She has done this business in her house for more than 10 years. As well as that, she also has a house that she rents, which gets her extra income. She says that she is in charge of taking care of her mother because she is very elderly and in a wheelchair. She is a very responsible and hard-working person. She says that her biggest dream is to keep helping her mother to have a better life. She is asking for a loan to buy construction materials to renovate the rental house. This way she can keep offering a good place to her tenants.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to renovate the rental house.

loans.name: Pescadin Group

texts.es:
Este grupo solidario está conformado por 3 mujeres, todas son de la etnia miskita de la ciudad de Bilwi, municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Son mujeres emprendedoras que luchan día a día por hacer crecer sus pequeños negocios; se organizaron como grupo solidario desde hace 12 meses para gestionar préstamos con garantía solidaria en Pana Pana. Decidieron nombrar al grupo solidario Pescadin, en honor a los mariscos y pescados, ya que es una de las principales actividades económicas de la Región.

REBECA: Es la coordinadora del grupo solidario, es una mujer luchadora, tiene 24 años de edad, soltera. Con el propósito de apoyar a su mamá con los gastos del hogar y estudios de sus hermanos, vende de manera ambulante mariscos, en un carretón de madera con un termo con hielo. Recuerda con gran alegría que inició con C$ 2,000 (Dos mil Córdobas), para poder comprar mariscos y pescados. Está solicitando préstamo para comprar más productos. Ella sueña con tener una refrigeradora, para almacenar sus productos.
texts.en:
This loan group is formed by 3 women. They are all of the Miskito ethnicity from the city of Bilwi, town of Puerto Cabezas. They are entrepreneurial women who fight every day to make their small businesses grow. They got together as a loan group 12 months ago to manage joint guarantee loans with Pana Pana. They decided to name the group Pescadin in honor of the seafood and fish because it is one of the main economic jobs in the region.

Rebeca is the coordinator of the loan group. She is a tenacious woman, 24-years old and single. In order to support her mother with the household expenses and her sibling's education, she sells seafood on the street in a wood wagon with a thermos of ice. She happily remembers that she started with C$2,000 (Two thousand Córdobas) to be able to buy seafood and fish. She is requesting a loan to buy more produce. She dreams of having a refrigerator to stock her products.

loans.use: to buy fish and seafood.

loans.name: Maura

texts.es:
La  Sra.  Maura tiene 25 años, está acompañada y tiene una hija, vive en la ciudad de Carapeguá.   
Maura empezó desde muy joven a trabajar como empleada doméstica y de a poco iba ahorrando su dinero para poder fabricar ella misma las tradicionales hamacas y sobrecamas que vende en la zona ya que su madre se dedica a eso y así dejar de ser empleada ajena, hoy día ya tiene clientela formada en la zona y así tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia.
Solicita el préstamo para la compra de hilos, hilos a color, bastidores, agujas y otros que en esta temporada lo solicitan mucho sus clientes.
texts.en: Maura is 25-years old. She is married and has one daughter. She lives in the city of Carapeguá. Maura started working at a young age as a domestic employee and gradually saved her money to be able to make the same traditional hammocks and bedspreads that are sold in the area. Her mother works doing this and she could stop being employed by other people. Currently she has a clientele in the area and thus has the means to be able to help her family. She is asking for a loan to buy yarn, colored yarn, embroidery, needles and others since her customers are ordering a lot this season.

loans.use: to buy yarn, colored yarn, embroidery, needles and others.

loans.name: Cynthia

texts.es:
Cynthia es una joven madre de dos hijos pequeños, trabaja como Docente Catedrática en universidades  y aparte tiene otro trabajo, para ella no hay impedimentos y sigue estudiando, y capacitándose día a día.
Su meta llegar a  terminar la Maestría que está haciendo en ciencias de la educación, y más adelante seguir estudiando  para ayudar y demostrarle a sus hijos que se puede salir adelante en la adversidad. 
Pide este préstamo para poder usarlo en pagar las clases de maestría que sigue, y de esa manera poder seguir con sus estudios, creciendo y mejorando cada día.
texts.en: Cynthia is a young mother of two small children. She works as a college professor and also has another job. For her there are no obstacles and she keeps studying and training herself every day. Her goal is to finish her Master's Degree that she is doing in Science Education. Later she wants to continue studying to help and demonstrate to her children that you can succeed in adversity. She is asking for this loan to be able to use to pay for her Master's classes that she is taking, and this way she will be able to keep studying, growing and improving every day.

loans.use: to pay for her Master's Degree classes.

loans.name: Piña Group

texts.es:
Este grupo solidario está conformado por cuatro mujeres, todas son de la etnia miskita de la ciudad de Bilwi, municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Son mujeres emprendedoras que luchan día a día por hacer crecer sus pequeños; organizaron como grupo solidario desde hace aproximadamente 4 años para gestionar préstamos con garantía solidaria en Pana Pana. Decidieron nombrar al grupo solidario, porque es una fruta fresca y de buen sabor.

POLIJINA: Es la Coordinadora del Grupo Solidario, es una señora amable de 46 años de edad, con cualidades de líder, casada. Su esposo trabaja de manera informal como ayudante de carga de frutas y verduras, tiene 9 hijos: 6 mayores de edad, 2 adolescentes que estudian su primaria y un pequeño de 4 años de edad. Desde hace 7 años estableció una pequeña pulpería, en un tramo que alquila en uno de los mercados del municipio de Puerto Cabezas, de esta manera contribuye con los gastos del hogar y educación de sus hijos. Está solicitando financiamiento para comprar bastimentos, chiverías, granos básicos, detergentes, entre otros productos. Ella sueña con tener una refrigeradora, para vender gaseosas, jugos, embutidos y tener su propio tramo.
texts.en:
This solidarity group is made up of four women. All of them are of Miskita ethnicity from the city of Bilwi, a municipality of Puerto Cabezas. They are entrepreneurial women who fight day after day to grow their small businesses. They organized as a solidarity group about 4 years ago in order to arrange joint guarantee loans with Pana Pana. They decided to name the group after a fresh and delicious fruit.

Polijina is the coordinator of the solidarity group. She is a friendly woman, 46 years old, married, with leadership qualities. Her husband works in an informal manner helping with the loading of fruits and vegetables. She has 9 children: 6 are adults, 2 youths study at primary school and her little one is 4 years of age.

Seven years ago she opened a small grocery store renting a stall at one of the markets in the municipality of Puerto Cabezas. In this way she contributes to the household expenses and the education of her children.

She is asking for financing in order to buy provisions, yogurts, basic grains, detergents, among other products. She dreams of having a refrigerator so she can sell soft drinks, juice, sausages, and of having her own stall.

loans.use: to buy provisions, yogurts, basic grains, detergents, and other products.

loans.name: Valores Group

texts.es:
El grupo solidario Valores, está conformado por 3 mujeres emprendedoras, pertenecen a la etnia miskita de la ciudad de Bilwi; se organizaron recientemente, con el propósito de trabajar de manera solidaria para poder tener acceso a préstamos en Pana Pana, que les permitiera incrementar el inventario de sus pequeños negocios, mejorar sus ingresos y así mejorar poco a poco las condiciones de vida de sus familias. Decidieron nombrar al grupo solidarios valores, para fomentar desde sus pequeños negocios y familias valores buenos.

BERNALICIA: Es integrante del grupo solidario, es una señora luchadora, con deseos de superación, tiene 31 años de edad, madre soltera de 4 hijos: El mayor de 10 años cursa cuarto grado de primaria y 3 menores de edad. Con el propósito de sacar adelante a sus hijos vende bastimentos en un tramo que tiene en uno de los mercados del municipio de Puerto Cabezas, recuerda con gran alegría que inicio su pequeño negocio con C$ 500 (Quinientos Córdobas Netos) vendiendo frutas de manera ambulante. Está solicitando su primer financiamiento para comprar: coco, yuca, malanga, chiltoma, cebolla, entre otras frutas y verduras. Ella sueña con sembrar frijoles y distribuirlos como comerciante mayorista.
texts.en:
The solidarity group Valores is made up of 3 entrepreneurial women belonging to the Miskita ethnicity from the city of Bilwi. They recently organized with the purpose of working in solidarity in order to access loans from Pana Pana which permit them to increase the inventory of their small businesses, improving their income little by little and so improving the living conditions of their families. They decided to name the solidarity group Valores to encourage high morals from their small businesses and their families.

Bernalicia is a member of the solidarity group. She is a fighting woman with a desire to succeed. She is 31 years old and a mother of 4 children. The oldest is 10 years old and is in 4th grade. She has three younger ones. With the purpose of providing for her children she sells provisions in a stall she has in one of the markets in the municipality of Puerto Cabezas. She remembers with great joy that she began her small business with 500 NIO selling fruit as a street vendor. She is asking for her first loan to buy: coconuts, cassava, malanga root, sweet peppers, onions, and other fruits and vegetables. She dreams of growing beans and distributing them as a wholesaler.

loans.use: to buy coconuts, cassava, malanga root, sweet peppers, onions, and other fruits and vegetables.

loans.name: Edgardo

texts.es:
Edgardo es un joven estudiante, de la ciudad de Santaní, está trabajando en una empresa maderera a la par que estudia la carrera de Ingeniería Agroindustrial.
Es una persona  honesta y  responsable es muy dedicada a sus estudio y a su trabajo, desea sobresalir adelante. Su meta es trabajar en una empresa, y enseñar en las universidades.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Edgardo is a young student, from the city of Santaní. He is working at a lumber yard while he is studying for a degree in agro-industrial engineering.

He is an honest and responsible person and is very dedicated to his studies and his work. He wants to stand out in the future. His goal is to work in a business and teach at the universities.

He asks for this loan to be able to invest it in paying the fees for his program, and in this way to be able to continue with his studies.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Arnaldo

texts.es:
Arnaldo es de la ciudad de Coronel Oviedo, está estudiando para ser Administrador Agropecuario, a la vez que estudia también trabaja para poder cubrir en cierta manera los gastos de sus estudios, es una persona muy sacrificada.
Comenta que más adelante desea dedicarse a la ganadería exclusivamente, y es por eso que pone todo de sí para lograrlo.
Pide este préstamo para poder invertirlo en el pago de las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Arnaldo is from the city of Coronel Oviedo. He is studying to be an Agricultural Administrator. At the same time he works in order to cover to some extent the expenses of his studies. He is a very self-sacrificing person.

He says that going forward he wants to dedicate himself to livestock exclusively and to achieve it he does everything he can.

He is asking for a loan in order to invest it in the payment of school fees so that he can continue with his studies.

loans.use: to pay university fees.

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es:
Alfredo está estudiando para ser un ingeniero comercial, comenta que la carrera es muy difícil, pero que pese a ello está poniendo todo de sí, lo ayudan siempre su familia.
A la par que estudia también trabaja, de manera a poder solventar los gastos de sus estudios.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir los gastos de su clase y sus derechos de exámenes, agradece por la oportunidad que recibe de poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Alfredo is studying to be a commercial engineer. He says that his program is very difficult but that despite that, he is putting his whole self into it and his family always helps him.

While he goes to school, he also works, so to be able to pay the costs of his education.

He asks for this loan to be able to cover the expenses of his classes and his exam fees, he is grateful for the opportunity that he is getting to be able to continue with his education.

loans.use: to pay for university classes and exam fees.

loans.name: Mi Flor Group

texts.es:
Este grupo solidario está conformado por tres mujeres trabajadoras, viven en la ciudad de Bilwi, municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Son mujeres emprendedoras que trabajan día a día con el empeño de lograr el crecimiento de sus pequeños negocios; se organizaron como grupo solidario desde hace aproximadamente 4 años para obtener préstamo en Pana Pana. 

SALLY ANTONIA: Es integrante del grupo solidario, es una señora afable de 32 años de edad, con deseos superación, casada. Su esposo trabaja de manera informal como buzo, tiene 2 hijos adolescentes que estudian su primaria. Desde hace 7 años estableció una pequeña pulpería en un tramo que alquila en uno de los mercados del municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Recuerda con entusiasmo que inicio vendiendo carbón de manera ambulante, gracias a los créditos otorgados por Pana Pana, le han permitido crecer en su negocio y mejorar su calidad de vida. Está solicitando financiamiento para comprar: Chiverías, granos básicos, detergentes y embutidos. Ella sueña con ser una comerciante exitosa.
texts.en:
This solidarity group is made up of three hard-working women who live in the city of Bilwi, in the municipality of Puerto Cabezas. They are enterprising women who work day to day with the determination to achieve the growth of their small businesses. They organized themselves as a solidarity group approximately 4 years ago to get a loan from Pana Pana.

SALLY ANTONIA: This member of the solidarity group is a good-natured woman, 32 years old, with the desire to improve herself. She is married and her husband works informally as a diver. She has 2 adolescent children who are in primary school. Seven years ago, she established a small general store in a spot she rents in one of the markets in the municipality of Puerto Cabezas. She remembers enthusiastically that she began selling charcoal as a street vendor, and thanks to the loans granted by Pana Pana, she has been able to grow in her business and improve her quality of life. She is asking for the loan to purchase chips, basic grains, detergents and cold cuts. She dreams of being a successful businesswoman.

loans.use: to purchase chips, basic grains, detergents and cold cuts.

loans.name: Ruth

texts.es:
Ruth es estudiante de la carrera de enfermería, comenta que su meta es recibirse y tener un empleo acorde a su carrera y desarrollarse como profesional y de esa forma poder ser útil a su comunidad y su familia.
Comenta que le gusta mucho su carrera, ya que de esa forma podrá ayudar a las personas lo cual siempre le gustó mucho.
Pide este préstamo para poder cubrir las cuotas de su carrera, con miras a poder seguir con sus estudios.
texts.en:
Ruth is a nursing student. She says that her goal is to graduate and get a job in her field and develop as a professional so that she can be useful to her family and her community.

She says that she really likes her major, since it is away that she can help people, something she has always really liked.

She is asking for this loan to cover her college tuition, with the intention of continuing her education.

loans.use: to make college tuition payments.

loans.name: Akawasito Group

texts.es:
Este grupo solidario está conformado por cuatro mujeres emprendedoras (Esperanza, Dalia, Olga y Lucila), viven en la ciudad de Bilwi, municipio de Puerto Cabezas. Son mujeres que luchan día a día por hacer crecer sus pequeños negocios de venta de ropa usada, mariscos y pulpería; se organizaron como grupo solidario desde hace aproximadamente 3 años para gestionar préstamos con garantía solidaria en Pana Pana. Nombraron al grupo solidario AKAWASITO, en honor a una comunidad del municipio de Puerto Cabezas.

ESPERANZA: Es la coordinadora del grupo solidario, es una señora sonriente de 58 años de edad, con cualidades de líder y deseos de superación, casada. Su esposo trabaja como guarda de seguridad, tiene una hija de 22 años de edad que estudia su cuarto año de carrera universitaria. Recuerda con gran alegría que inicio con sus ahorros vendiendo de manera ambulante productos de medicina natural, gracias a los créditos otorgados anteriormente por PANA PANA, le han permitido establecer una pulpería. Está solicitando financiamiento, para comprar: Chiverías, granos básicos, entre otros productos. Ella sueña con ser una comerciante exitosa
texts.en:
This support group is made up of four enterprising women (Esperanza, Dalia, Olga and Lucila). They live in the city of Bilwi, town of Puerto Cabezas. They are women who fight day to day to grow their small businesses selling used clothes, selling seafood and running a general store. They organized as a support group approximately 3 years ago to manage loans with supportive security in Pana Pana. They named the group AKAWASITO, in honor of a community in the municipality of Puerto Cabezas.

ESPERANZA is the coordinator of the support group. She is a smiling 58 year old woman with leadership qualities and a desire to get ahead. She is married. Her husband works as a security guard. She has a 22 year old daughter who is in her fourth year of college. She happily remembers that she started with her savings, selling natural medicinal products as a street vendor. Thanks to the previous loans from PANA PANA, she has been able to open a general store. She is asking for a loan to buy snacks, basic grains, and other products. She dreams of being a successful merchant.

loans.use: to buy snacks, basic grains and other products.

loans.name: Mercedes

texts.es:
Mercedes es una persona muy sacrificada que estudia para poder salir adelante y dar a su hijo una vida digna y sin privaciones, comenta que por medio de su préstamo anterior pudo pagar las cuotas de su carrera, lo cual le fue de mucha utilidad.
Ella pide hoy este nuevo préstamo para poder volver a pagar las cuotas de su carrera, y de esa forma poder continuar estudiando y persiguiendo sus sueños.
texts.en:
Mercedes is a very hardworking person who goes to school to get ahead and give her child a dignified life that lacks nothing. She says that through the previous loan, she was able to pay for her college tuition, which was very useful to her.

Today she is asking for a new loan to be able to pay for college tuition again. This way, she can keep going to school and pursuing her dreams.

loans.use: to pay for college tuition.

loans.name: Sen

texts.en:
Sen is 37 years old. She lives in her own home along with her husband and three children. She is a very responsible woman who, seeking to support her family, works selling tilapia. In addition to this, she works in agriculture, where her principal crops are the vegetables that she then sells. These activities allow her to obtain the necessary income to support the household economy.

Sen, seeking to improve her business, is applying to QBWDF for a loan to invest in sand, cement, and rocks and pay for labor for the construction of a pond in order to increase the number of tilapia and in this way to increase her sales and thus also her earnings.

loans.use: to construct a pond to increase the number of tilapia she can sell.

loans.name: Thuy

texts.en:
Thuy is 58 years old and resides in her own home alongside her life companion and her children. Thuy, in search of improving her quality of life and that of her family, works raising and selling tilapia. This business allows her to obtain the necessary income to be able to maintain the financial stability of the household. She has run this business for about 20 years. Thanks to this, she is very well known in the market and her customers prefer her.

She is requesting a loan from QBWDF to invest in sand, cement, bricks, stones, and payment of manual labor to build a fish pond in which to raise a larger number of tilapia and thus increase her earnings to maintain her family.

loans.use: to build a fish pond in which to raise a larger number of tilapia.

loans.name: Jayanti's Group

texts.en:
Jayanti, 34, is a married woman, shown in the photo standing to the left. She has two children. She is very skilled in the art of hand embroidery and has been using this skill for many years to earn a living.

Some years back, she was hardly managing her household activities with the small income of her husband. Then because of her strong determination and will power, she initiated her business of hand embroidery. She can make beautiful designs and patterns with her hands. Her skill is known throughout the town.

She, along with her group member, has requested a loan of 30,000 INR from Kiva's partner Peoples Forum. This loan will enable her to purchase more beads, threads, and frames to meet orders of her customers on time to earn good amount of profits. This monetary help can take Jayanti closer to her dream of providing quality education to her children.

Jayanti is eagerly awaiting your kind hearts to help her.

loans.use: to purchase more beads, threads, and frames to meet orders of her customers on time.

loans.name: Eulalia

texts.en: Eulalia has been married for over 10 years. She is the owner of the house where she lives with her family. She lives in an adobe house. Eulalia is a strong woman. She sells milk and also works as a mason assistant. Eulalia needs a loan to buy a milking cow for her farm. Eulalia would like to buy a car in the future to transport her milk.

loans.use: to buy a milking cow for her farm

loans.name: Tu

texts.en:
Tu is 61 years old and lives with her husband and four children. Tu, in search of improving her quality of life and that of her family, works raising and selling tilapia. This business allows her to obtain the necessary income to be able to maintain the financial stability of the household. She has run this business for about 20 years. Thanks to this, she is very well known in the market and her customers prefer her.

She is requesting a loan from QBWDF to invest in sand, cement, bricks, stones, and payment of manual labor to be able to build a fish pond in which to raise a larger number of tilapia and thus increase her earnings to maintain her home.

loans.use: to build a fish pond in which to raise a larger number of tilapia

loans.name: Thuong

texts.en:
Thuong is 38 years old and lives in her own home along with her husband and two children. She is a very responsible woman who, seeking to support her family, works selling tilapia. In addition to this, she works in agriculture, where her principal crops are vegetables that she then sells. These activities allow her to earn the necessary income to support the household.

Thuong, seeking to improve her business, is applying to QBWDF for a loan to invest in sand, cement, and rocks and pay for labor for the construction of a pond in order to increase the number of tilapia and in this way to increase her sales and thus also her earnings.

loans.use: to construct a pond to increase the number of tilapia to sell

loans.name: Uma's Group

texts.en:
At the age of 38, Uma is a determined woman who lives with her husband, who is a driver by profession, and two school-going daughters (aged 13 and 12) in an RCC-roofed home in Jeypore in Odisha, India.

She is standing to the left in the photograph. With the entire family’s financial burden on her husband, Uma has decided to don the role of a micro-entrepreneur to improve their financial conditions. Having an experience of one year in tailoring, Uma decided to put this skill to best use and start her own tailoring business to complement her husband's earnings.

What she lacks is a capital investment to make a new beginning. So she, along with her group member, is requesting a loan amount of 30,000 INR from Kiva's partner Peoples Forum.

She will use her portion of the loan amount to buy a new sewing machine with stand and motor and to purchase materials like thread, needles etc. Uma is highly confident of her skill and wishes to run her business from her home.

Uma is eagerly waiting for your kind help and is heartily expressing her thanks to her lenders.

loans.use: to buy a new sewing machine with stand and motor and purchase materials like thread, needles, etc.

loans.name: Damai's Group

texts.en:
Damai hails from a low-income household from an interior, remote and tribal village of Jeypore, Odisha, India. She is a married lady living with her two sons and husband. The lady standing in the middle in the photograph is Damai.

Damai has struggled a lot in her life in order to sustain herself and her family. She is a lady with patience, determination and strong willpower.

Lack of financial resources prevented her from building a hygienic toilet at her home and getting access to basic sanitary facilities. This has compelled her and her family to walk long distances in odd hours in order to defecate and urinate. This practice is neither safe nor feasible in the long run.

Damai, along with her other group members, is requesting a loan amount of 45,000 INR. She will use her portion of the loan amount to build a well equipped toilet and attach all the requisite sanitary fittings to it. The loan will help her get access to basic sanitation facilities and thereby improve the health of her family.

Damai is in dire need of your kind help and is eagerly awaiting your support.

loans.use: to build a well equipped toilet and attach all the requisite sanitary fittings.

loans.name: Gurubari's Group

texts.en:
Gurubari is a simple lady who hails from a very poor and low-income household from a small village of Koraput district, Odisha, India. She is a married lady and resides with her husband and two sons and two daughters. Her husband is the sole earner in her family and works very hard to be make ends meet. The income earned by her husband is only hand-to-mouth for them.

Unfortunately, Gurubari does not have an appropriate toilet facility at her home and has to walk long distances in order to relieve herself in dense bushes late at night and early in the evening. She finds this practice very dangerous as she feels the risk of insect and animal bites and she is vulnerable to crimes.

In order to restore her privacy and maintain proper hygiene, Gurubari, along with her group members, is requesting a loan amount of 45,000 INR. She will use her portion of the loan amount to install a latrine pan, a hand pump and a toilet in her house.

Your loan will help Gurubari to enjoy a healthy and disease-free life.

loans.use: to install a latrine pan, a hand pump and a toilet in her house.

loans.name: Khiramani's Group

texts.en:
Khiramani is a simple and a humble lady standing to the left in the photograph. She hails from a very poor and low-income household from a small village of Koraput district, Odisha, India. She is a married lady and resides with her husband and two sons and leads a very simple life with access to very limited resources. Her husband is the sole earner in her family and works very hard to make ends meet.

Khiramani does not have an appropriate toilet facility at her home and has to walk long distances in order to relieve herself in dense bushes late at night and early in the evening. She finds this practice very dangerous as she feels the risk of insect and animal bites and she is vulnerable to crimes and molestations.

So in order to restore her privacy and maintain proper health and hygiene, Khiramani, along with her group members, is requesting a loan amount of 45,000 INR. She will use her portion of the loan amount to install a latrine pan, incorporate water pipes and build a toilet in her house.

Your loan will help Khiramani to enjoy a healthy and disease-free life and promote cleanliness in the community.

loans.use: to install a latrine pan, incorporate water pipes and build a toilet in her house.

loans.name: Sarula's Group

texts.en:
Sarula lives in a village of rural Odisha, India. She manages a betel nut cutting unit. The activity involved is simple. She sources betel nuts from different palm growers. The nuts are cut, trimmed or sliced into several pieces and shavings and then supplied to the local market for use in other products or for consumption as an aid in digestion.

Sarula has been engaging in this work for about four years. Her husband is a mason with irregular wages. Two of her sons have had to begin working after just high school. The family hopes that the youngest completes his graduate studies.

Sarula, along with her group member, has applied for a loan of 30,000 INR to help her in her small business. The entire amount Sarula will use to source a good quantity of betel nuts, which she will process before selling in the local market.

Let us appreciate this hard-working lady who is engaged in an independent activity to earn a livelihood and provide minimum levels of comfort to her household.

Sarula is standing to the left in the photograph.

loans.use: to source a good quantity of betel nuts.

loans.name: Thu

texts.en:
Thu is 50 years old and lives with her husband and two children. Thu, in search of improving her quality of life and that of her family, works raising and selling tilapia. This business allows her to earn the necessary income to be able to maintain the household. She has run this business for about 20 years. Thanks to this, she is very well known in the market and her customers prefer her.

She is requesting a loan from QBWDF to invest in sand, cement, bricks, stones, and payment of manual labor to be able to build a fish pond in which to raise a larger number of tilapia and thus increase her earnings to maintain her home.

loans.use: to construct a fish pond to raise a larger number of tilapia

loans.name: Jacqueline Edmond

texts.fr:
Jacqueline a 43 ans. C'est une femme divorcée, il y a maintenant 8 ans. Elle a trois enfants et ils sont tous à sa charge. Ils ont 13, 15 et 16 ans et sont tous scolarisés. C'est une femme très courageuse et travailleuse. Elle assume seule ses enfants , son ex-mari ne l'appui pas.
Pour gagner sa vie, elle vend des vêtements neufs et des friperies et ce depuis 2010 et à part ça, elle a une autre spécialité, elle est bijoutier, elle sait façonner des bijoux en or et en argent et c'est ce qu'elle pratique bien avant la vente des vêtements.
Son objectif depuis toujours est de construire sa propre maison et puis offrir à ses enfants une meilleure condition de vie, même si leur père ne s'en fout pas.
texts.en:
Jacqueline is 43 years old. She has been divorced for eight years now. She has three children and is still responsible for all of them. They are 13, 15, and 16 years old and are all enrolled in school. She is a very courageous and hardworking woman and assumes all the responsibility for her children, as her husband does not support her.

To earn a living, she has been selling new and used clothing since 2010. Apart from that, she has another specialty: she is a jeweler. She knows how to fashion gold and silver jewelry and that is what she did long before she sold clothing.

Jacqueline's goal has always been to build her own house and offer her children better living conditions, even if their father doesn't care about them.

loans.use: to buy shorts, skirts, and pants for resale.

loans.name: Hoai

texts.en:
Mrs. Hoai is 52 years old, lives with two children. She is a very responsible woman who, seeking to support her family, works selling tilapia. In addition to this, she works in agriculture, where her principal crops are the vegetables that she then sells. These activities allow her to obtain the necessary income to support the household economy.

Hoai, seeking to improve her business, is applying to QBWDF for a loan to invest in sand, cement, and rocks and pay for labor for the construction of a pond in order to increase the number of tilapia and in this way to increase her sales and thus also her earnings.

loans.use: to construct a pond and therefore increase the number of tilapia raised and in this way to increase her sales and earnings.

loans.name: Petronila

texts.en:
Petronila is the mother of 4 children and she lives with her boyfriend for over 5 years. Petronila is the owner of the house where she lives with her family.

She is in the dairy and cheese making business, which she learned about when she was a child. Petronila is assisted by her boyfriend, but she needs your help, because she wants to buy a milking cow which will help her make more cheese.

loans.use: to buy a milking cow, to be able to make more cheese

loans.name: Raksana

texts.en:
